name: bcriger.github.io
body:
# About Me
I'm a post-doc at the [Institut FÃ¼r Quanteninformation](http://www.quantuminfo.physik.rwth-aachen.de/) at the RWTH in Aachen. I study the design and implementation of quantum error-correcting codes in superconducting architectures. 

#Things I Do:
 + [py_qcode](py-qcode): A fledgling package for decoding topological quantum error-correcting codes in Python.
 + [QuaEC](http://www.cgranade.com/python-quaec/): A more mature package for performing sundry tasks related to quantum error correction. Collaboration with [Chris Granade](http://www.cgranade.com).

# Other Things:
 + [Google Code](http://code.google.com/u/BCriger/)
 + [Bitbucket](http://bitbucket.org/bcriger)
 + [Papers on the ArXiv](http://arxiv.org/find/all/1/all:+criger/0/1/0/all/0/1)
